long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CertifyMe is an easy-to-use Chrome extension designed for anyone interested in learning new skills. It provides quick access to a list of free and discounted certifications from trusted platforms like Coursera, IBM, Microsoft, and more. Whether youâ€™re starting your IT career, enhancing your business skills, or learning new technologies, CertifyMe helps you discover relevant certification programs and tracks your progress as you go.
